hey was i trying to get you to go #msfree today .. did you see the tweet I sent you yesterday
When we seeing your iPhone app? :)
lol ... I think the bigger challenge will be getting @NickHodge to develop an iPhone app :)
its pointer ariithmetic I'm worried about
I've let my C skills get a bit rusty (used to be able to cut about 2K lines a day) :)
will wait to hear your thoughts on the books, before I grab some myself
have you done much C programming in the past?
lots of material at the developer.apple.com site, but a littlle difficult to work out where to start
how do you plan to start on the R&R? i'm lookng for a good iPhone Xcode tut myself :)
what bandwidth is required?
depends if I'm working from my home office otherwise 3G USB for everywhere else
i would prefer neither .. but think we are little way off from that just yet
my wifi network seemse to be pretty responsive for my needs - can even watch iView and talk on Skype. What else is required?
what you reckon? wifi instead of NBN? http://www.itwire.com/content/view/22330/53/1/1/

that food court has had it for a while .. doesn't work closer to Rundle Mall end near the Coffee bar

lol .. don't let us distract u
you should be out there to enjoying the wild life :)

it was too far away and it was also lunch time in the real world
